original: Hultgren, Bror Georg, läroverksadjunkt, Kalmar, f. 3/1/02 i Kungsör, Västmanl. 1., av dir. David H. o. Agnes Adin. G. 34 m. fil. mag. Gunhild Larsson. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 25, fil. mag. 33, provår v. Gbgs folksk :sem. 37. Lär. v. Sävsjö priv. sk. 30-31, Emmaboda komm. mellansk. 31-35 o. 36, i Köping 35-36, Karlskrona 37-38, Växjö 42-43, ord. ämneslär. v. Valdemar sviks komm. mellansk. 38, adj. i matem. o. fysik v. Kalmar h. a. 1. sed. 43.
translated: Hultgren, Bror Georg, high school (läroverk) teacher, from Kalmar. Born on January 3rd, 1902 in Kungsör, Västmanland, first district, to director David H. and Agnes Adin. Married in 1934 to Gunhild Larsson, who holds a Master of Arts degree. Completed high school studies (stud:ex.) in Uppsala in 1925, obtained a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1933 and completed a trial year at the Gothenburg people's high school in 1937. Worked as a teacher at the private school in Sävsjö in 1930-31, Emmaboda in 1931-35 and 1936, in Köping in 1935-36, Karlskrona in 1937-38, Växjö in 1942-43. Became a regular subject teacher at Valdemar Svensson's municipality in 1938, and a mathematics and physics assistant teacher at Kalmar high school from 1943 onwards.

structured.name: Bror Georg Hultgren
jobTitle: Assistant teacher in mathematics and physics
